recipes.title: Steamed Eggs
recipes.description: A simple steamed eggs recipe for you to try out!
recipes.author: Maryam Sakinah
instructions: Turn on the mini cooking pot, pour water over it, and let it boil for a while.
Combine eggs, salt, pepper and cheese slices in a bowl and beat well.
When the water has boiled, put a steamer rack on top of it and put in the bowl, let it steam for about 6-12 minutes.
Top it off with scallions and enjoy.

recipes.title: Mac and Cheese
recipes.description: A simple mac and cheese recipe for you to try out!
recipes.author: Maryam Sakinah
instructions: Boil 1 pack of macaroni, and sprinkle a dash of salt and a bit of cooking oil to get the pasta taste good and to prevent them from sticking with each other. Tossed the water when the pasta has cooked.
Chop up your onions and sausages.
Pour a bit of oil and onions on the pot and let it cook for awhile, after the onions has cooked, pour all the hotdogs and stir them well.
Add milk and cheese, stir until all the cheese has melted and pour in all the macaroni.
Add chilli powder, stir again until well combined and you’re done!

recipes.title: Korean Friend Rice
recipes.description: A simple Korean friend rice recipe for you to try out!
recipes.author: Maryam Sakinah
instructions: Cook 1 pot of sushi rice with water and set it aside.
Pour a bit of oil and cook an egg.
In a bowl, put the cooked rice and egg and add soy sauces, sesame oil, sesame seed and seaweed.
Stir well to incorporate the rice with the other ingredients.
Prepare to feast!

recipes.title: Gigi Hadid's Pasta Halal Version
recipes.description: A simple Gigi Hadid's pasta recipe halal version for muslims to try out! This recipe is inspired by Gigi Hadid's pasta recipe.
recipes.author: Maryam Sakinah
instructions: Boil water with a bit of salt and oil, and pour in the pasta. Toss the water after the pasta has cooked.
Take a knife and chop onion and garlic into small pieces.
In a different pot, pour a bit of oil and put in the chopped onion and garlic, stir and cook them well.
Add tomato puree, cooking cream, chili flakes, pepper and salt to complete the taste.
Pour ½ cup of boiled pasta water into the sauce and mix it well.
Pour the cooked pasta into the pot and mix well
Add butter, Parmesan cheese and sprinkle with thyme.
Incorporate it together and enjoy!

recipes.title: Maggie Chilli Oil
recipes.description: If you're big fans of garlic and spice, try upgrading your instant maggie with this 10-minute Chili Oil Instant Maggie.
recipes.author: Maryam Sakinah
instructions: Boil the maggi noodles and toss the water after the noodle has cooked.
Slice up the garlic and heat up the cooking oil.
In a bowl, combine garlic, ketchup, chilli flakes and Maggi Kari powder, and lastly pour the hot cooking oil.
Add maggi noodles and mix well. Suggestion: add other proteins like egg or chicken into the dish to make it more appetising.

recipes.title: Sardine and Egg
recipes.author: Maryam Sakinah
instructions: Pour the sardine into a bowl and separate the sardine fish and the tomato sauce.
Fry the sardine on a pan with some oil until it looks crispy.
Pick up the sardine and leave it aside, in the same pan, add sliced shallot and garlic and stir well until cooked.
Pour the tomato sauce from the tin and add water, soy sauce, salt, sugar, and mix well.
Add in the stir fried sardine and mashed it in the mixture.
Add eggs, sliced shallots, sliced chilli peppers, cilantro and squeeze a bit of key lime to get the best taste.
Wait for the eggs to cook and it’s now ready to serve.

recipes.title: Cheeskut
recipes.author: Maryam Sakinah
instructions: In one bowl, add cream cheese and condensed milk, mix it well.
In another bowl, pour in the full cream milk and add a bit of milk into the first bowl to get a smooth texture.
Dip biscuits into the milk bowl, soaking it completely and arrange it on a dish tray.
Slather the cream cheese mix on top of the soaked biscuits, and repeat the process of layering until it is finished.
Add in milo powder and nestum powder in the middle of layering.
